meanings.definition: The act of affixing or attaching something
meanings.sent1: The affixture of the stamp to the envelope was done carefully.
meanings.sent2: The affixture of the sign to the wall was secure.
meanings.sent3: The affixture of the bow to the present made it look festive.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an affixture to brighten up the room.
meanings.sent5: The affixture of the key to the keychain made it easier to find.

meanings.definition: Something that is affixed or attached
meanings.sent1: The affixture on the door was a new handle.
meanings.sent2: The affixture on the paper was a colorful sticker.
meanings.sent3: The affixture on the cake was a tiny flag.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was like an affixture to the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The affixture on the book was a personalized bookplate.
